column4: Hi all, I want to install tinycorelinux inside ubuntu, but I can't find information about it. Any help?
install virtual box and then tiny core ontop of that
or reduce the size of your ubu partition and install tiny core in dual boot into the remaining new space you opened up.
found this, long read, but describe what you want to do with tiny core. >>> http://gr8idea.info/os/tutorials/tiny-core/install.html
